messages.title: You Can Change the Future of Britain

issues.health: The Lib Dems are fighting to protect what's most important to families - our NHS, schools and jobs.
issues.labourEmployment: Labour are too busy fighting with each other to fight for you.

community.content: We want to keep the UK in the single market and build an economy that works for you and your family wherever you live.

quotes.text: "Labour is fatally divided inside Parliament and outside it."
"We cannot fight and win with Jeremy as our leader."
"Jeremy Corbyn's position is no longer tenable if we are to be effective."
"I will not countenance ever voting to make Corbyn prime minister."
"The Liberal Democrats have raised half a million pounds from grassroots supporters since the snap General Election was called, more than twice as much as Labour."
"Liberal Democrats celebrate stunning council wins in both North and South."
"Lib Dems have been enjoying a stunning run of local success, snatching council seats in traditional Labour places such as Rotherham, Sunderland and Kettering."
"Lib Dems gain 1,000 members in the first hour after general election announced."

examples: "The Liberal Democrats have raised half a million pounds from grassroots supporters since the snap General Election was called, more than twice as much as Labour."

"We cannot fight and win with Jeremy as our leader."

"I will not countenance ever voting to make Corbyn prime minister."
The Lib Dems are fighting to protect what's most important to families - our NHS, schools and jobs.
Labour are too busy fighting with each other to fight for you.
We want to keep the UK in the single market and build an economy that works for you and your family wherever you live.
